content: side of heel flap work 32 sts row 1 in chart according on page 6 place bro marker pick up and k16 sts from along side of heel flap you have 84 sts in total 20+16+32+16 k36 you have 52 sts on the one needle 1 and 32 sts on the needle two 2 round 2 1 k1 ssk k48 k2tog k1 2 you knit row1 in chart according on page 6 round 3 1 k50 2 you knit row 2 in chart according on page 6 3 you have 82 sts in total repeat rnds 2-3 nine more times you have 64 sts in total 32 sts on the one needle 1 and 32 sts on the other needle 2 continue working following to chart according on page 6 for needle 2 and knitting all sts for needle 1 when sock measure 17 cm in total including heel flap knit all 64 sts on the round only the front sts five more times and start working decreases round 1 on the needle one 1 k1 ssk k28 k2tog k1 on the needle two 2 k1 ssk k28 k2tog k1 you have 60 sts in total 30 sts on the needle one 1 and 30 sts on the needle two 2 round 2 and round 3 on the needle one 1 k30 on the needle two 2 k30 repeat rnds 1-3 two more times you have 58 sts in total 26 sts on the needle one 1 and 26 sts on the needle two 2 now we start working decreases in this way rnd1 on the needle one 1 k1 ssk k20 k2tog k1 on the needle two 2 k1 ssk k20 k2tog k1 round 2 on the needle one 1 k20 on the needle two 2 4 k20 repeat rnds 1-2 three more times you have 40 sts in total 20 sts on the needle one 1 and 20 sts on the needle two 2 next working decreases in each row rnd1 on the needle one 1 k1 ssk k16 k2tog k1 on the needle two 2 k1 ssk k16 k2tog k1 rnd2 on the needle one 1 k1 ssk k14 k2tog k1 on the needle two 2 k1 ssk k14 k2tog k1 repeat rnds 1-2 three more times you have 20 sts in total 10 sts on the needle one 1 and 10 sts on the needle two 2 finishing weave in all loose ends and block the socks by soaking them in cold to lukewarm water dry flat enjoy it 5 chart - purl - yarn over - knit - knit 2 together - slip slip knit row 1 k2tog yo k1 yo ssk p3 row 2 k5 p3 row 3 k4 yo ssk p2 row 4 k6 p2 row 5 k5 yo ssk p1 row 6 k7 p1 row 7 p3 k2tog yo k1 yo ssk row 8 p3 k5 row 9 p2 k2tog yo k4 row 10 p2 k6 row 11 p1 k2tog yo k5
